snippets.title: Read a File
snippets.description: Reads the entire content of a file.
snippets.code:
with open('file.txt', 'r') as file:
    content = file.read()
    print(content)
snippets.author: @technoph1le

snippets.title: Write to a File
snippets.description: Writes a string to a file.
snippets.code:
with open('file.txt', 'w') as file:
    file.write('Hello, World!')
snippets.author: @technoph1le

snippets.title: Dictionary Comprehension
snippets.description: Creates a dictionary with squares of numbers.
snippets.code:
squares = {x: x*x for x in range(6)}
print(squares)
snippets.author: @technoph1le
